prod_short_desc: Rescue The Flash™ from Eclipso’s evil plans!
prod_long_desc:
Join in the action-packed LEGO® DC Super Hero Girls™ world as Wonder Woman™ battles Eclipso™ to save The Flash™! This great set features a cool foldout palace with 2 levels, 4 ‘power drain’ tubes, planning room, vanity and weapons cabinets, Eclipso’s Jewel Jet, Wonder Woman’s Invisible Jet, loads of accessory elements, plus 3 orange Kryptomites.
Includes 3 mini-doll figures: Wonder Woman™, Eclipso™ and The Flash™, plus 3 orange Kryptomite™ figures.
Features a foldout palace, opening tubes to hold The Flash™, Wonder Woman™ and other LEGO® DC Super Hero Girls™ characters, powering station in the center, planning room, vanity cabinet, weapons cabinet, a Kryptomite™ creation section and a separate Kryptomite training station.
Also includes Wonder Woman’s Invisible Jet with opening 2-mini-doll cockpit and Eclipso’s Jewel Jet with opening mini-doll cockpit.
Open the gate and unfold the palace to access the inside rooms and tubes.
Train the Kryptomites on the training station to help in the fight.
Open the tube to rescue The Flash™ before his powers are completely drained.
Use the vanity cabinet or weapons cabinet and get ready for the battle.
Lift the Jewel Jet from the top of the palace to help Eclipso™ escape.
Accessory elements include a staff, sword, flail, sai, Wonder Woman’s Lasso of Truth, Wonder Woman’s shield, laboratory bottles, lipstick, brush, perfume bottles, pickaxe, hammer and anvil, and 3 crystals.
Combine with the 41237 Batgirl™ Secret Bunker and expand your Super Hero play!
Cute but evil Kryptomites are included in every LEGO® DC Super Hero Girls™ set.
Eclipso™ Dark Palace measures over 14” high, 10” wide and 5” long.
Kryptomite™ training station measures over 2” high, 1” wide and 1” long.
Invisible Jet measures over 1” high, 6” long and 8” wide.
Eclipso’s Jewel Jet measures over 1” high, 7” long and 3” wide.
